column4: Are there any real (performance) issues when using a Wubi ubuntu installation? Is there any reason why it is preferrable to partition the HD for installing it? Thanks.
a little slower, and just a file in windows....you do the math.
read what the wubi designer says. http://howsoftwareisbuilt.com/2009/03/12/interview-with-agostino-russo-wubi-ubuntu/
using a shared partition is the most stable way to share, I use a ntfs as well.
